use.flag: Support ID3v1 and ID3v2 tags of audio files.
Provide support for Microsoft's 'advanced systems format' media container.
Add support for playlists (m3u and pls).

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Enjoy is a simple and fast music player using EFL.
It uses media-libs/lightmediascanner to build a collection out of metadata found in music files, allowing for artist, album or genre browsing.
Built on top of Enlightenment Foundation Libraries such as Elementary and Emotion it is slim and fast, while looks nice.
